content.body:
### Shop 235/50R19 Tire Size The 235/50R19 is a pretty popular tire size, one that you can find on everything from the Dodge Grand Caravan and Jeep Cherokee to the Hyundai Tucson, Honda Element, Toyota Sienna and Subaru Forester. If you’ve got one of these vehicles, you should consider the versatility of all-season tires that offer low noise, a comfortable ride, year-round traction (even in light snow) and predictable handling. Tires like the [Pirelli Scorpion All Season Plus 3](https://simpletire.com/brands/pirelli-tires/scorpion-all-season-plus-3), Continental CrossContact LX25, Yokohama Geolandar CV G058, and Firestone Destination LE3 are all excellent choices in the 235/50R19 size. Popular vehicles: 2008-2010 Dodge Grand Caravan
2019-2021 Jeep Cherokee
2020-2021 Hyundai Tucson
2007-2011 Honda Element
2011-2020 Toyota Sienna
2013-2018 Subaru Forester If you live in a part of the country that has tough winters with lots of snow that lingers for weeks, all season tires probably can’t get the job done. It’s worth looking into dedicated winter tires that have a softer tread compound and an aggressive tread pattern to stay flexible and dig into deep snow and slush. Check out winter tires like the [Bridgestone Blizzak WS90](https://simpletire.com/brands/bridgestone-tires/blizzak-ws90), Michelin Pilot Alpin 5, Nokian Hakkapeliitta R3 SUV, and Yokohama iceGUARD iG52c. All-weather tires are a newer tire type that blend the best of all-season and winter tires for true year-round traction. Consider the Goodyear Assurance WeatherReady, Michelin CrossClimate 2 A/W CUV, [Toyo Celsius CUV](https://simpletire.com/brands/toyo-tires/celsius-cuv), and Nokian WR G4 SUV if you only want one set of tires are need something that can handle moderate to severe winter weather. Whether you drive a Jeep Cherokee, Hyundai Tucson, Toyota Sienna, or something else, SimpleTire has a set of 235/50R19 tires that meets your needs at a great price!
